member.name: T:Microsoft.VisualStudio.Services.ReleaseManagement.WebApi.Contracts.Change
member.summary: Represents a change associated with a build.

member.name: P:Microsoft.VisualStudio.Services.ReleaseManagement.WebApi.Contracts.Change.Id
member.summary: Something that identifies the change. For a commit, this would be the SHA1. For a TFVC changeset, this would be the changeset id.

member.name: P:Microsoft.VisualStudio.Services.ReleaseManagement.WebApi.Contracts.Change.Message
member.summary: A description of the change. This might be a commit message or changeset description.

member.name: P:Microsoft.VisualStudio.Services.ReleaseManagement.WebApi.Contracts.Change.Location
member.summary: The location of the full representation of the resource.

member.name: P:Microsoft.VisualStudio.Services.ReleaseManagement.WebApi.Contracts.Change.DisplayUri
member.summary: The location of a user-friendly representation of the resource.

member.name: T:Microsoft.VisualStudio.Services.ReleaseManagement.WebApi.Contracts.EnvironmentExecutionPolicy
member.summary: Defines policy on environment queuing at Release Management side queue. We will send to Environment Runner [creating pre-deploy and other steps] only when the policies mentioned are satisfied.

member.name: P:Microsoft.VisualStudio.Services.ReleaseManagement.WebApi.Contracts.EnvironmentExecutionPolicy.ConcurrencyCount
member.summary: This policy decides, how many environments would be with Environment Runner.

member.name: P:Microsoft.VisualStudio.Services.ReleaseManagement.WebApi.Contracts.EnvironmentExecutionPolicy.QueueDepthCount
member.summary: Queue depth in the EnvironmentQueue table, this table keeps the environment entries till Environment Runner is free [as per it's policy] to take another environment for running.

member.name: F:Microsoft.VisualStudio.Services.ReleaseManagement.WebApi.Contracts.ExecutionPoliciesConstants.ConcurrencyInfinite
member.summary: No limit on environments in running state [being pre-deploy or any other step] for a given definition environment at any point of time.

member.name: F:Microsoft.VisualStudio.Services.ReleaseManagement.WebApi.Contracts.ExecutionPoliciesConstants.ConcurrencyOnlyOne
member.summary: Only one environment can be in running state [being pre-deploy or any other step] for a given definition environment at any point of time.

member.name: F:Microsoft.VisualStudio.Services.ReleaseManagement.WebApi.Contracts.ExecutionPoliciesConstants.QueueDepthInfinite
member.summary: No limit on environments that could be queued.

member.name: F:Microsoft.VisualStudio.Services.ReleaseManagement.WebApi.Contracts.ExecutionPoliciesConstants.QueueDepthLastReleaseOnly
member.summary: Only last environment will be kept in queue till Environment Runner is freed up as per the policy

member.name: F:Microsoft.VisualStudio.Services.ReleaseManagement.WebApi.Contracts.RepositoryCleanOptions.AllBuildDir
member.summary: Re-create $(agnet.buildDirectory) which contains $(build.sourcesDirectory), $(build.binariesDirectory) and any folders that left from previous build.

member.name: P:Microsoft.VisualStudio.Services.ReleaseManagement.WebApi.Contracts.ReleaseDefinitionDeployStep.Tasks
member.summary: The list of steps for this definition.

member.param: Project ID or project name
